name: Beat Batter
description:
Come on! Test your sports skills and hit skills! See the surprises and wonder every level holds for you. Swipe the screen to control the batter to hitting the ball.

Idle game features:
- Multiple levels of increasing difficulty ball game
- Very simple idle baseball game with only one finger swipe
- Numerous popular song and ball stars on fire

Free song and amazing music and ball skins are waiting for you to take.

Fast, compact gameplay:
- Enjoy a speedy, streamlined playing experience.
- Hit massive dingers and get thrilling strikeouts.
- Specialized auto functions by game, by inning, and by player are a given!

Customize your players:
- Change their faces, pick body types, and choose different batting and pitching motions.
- Try equipping a range of bats, hats, balls, and more to customize your players in unique ways.
